title: Megatron at the Jalen Rose Golf Classic
description:
Jalen and Jacoby are on site at the Jalen Rose Golf Classic raising money for The Jalen Rose Leadership Academy. Calvin Johnson is in the house to talk about his expectations for the upcoming Lions’ season and what he thinks of Coach Dan Campbell’s leadership. Also, LeBron causes mayhem at Crawsover as he shows up in Seattle for the first time in 15 years. Listen to find out why LeBron showing up is a big deal and what it means for his championship aspirations. Plus, Jayson Tatum played with a fracture in his wrist during the NBA playoffs. Jalen breaks down what he saw from Tatum’s play that caught his eye. Thank you for all your support, for more information on today’s event go to jalenrosegolfclassic.com.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: ESPN, Jalen Rose, David Jacoby
